General.Name: Bike24 Holding AG
General.Description: Bike24 Holding AG operates online cycling platforms in Germany, Austria, Switzerland, rest of Europe, and internationally. It retails a range of traditional bicycles, e-bikes with electric motors, spare parts, accessories, and sportswear through online. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Dresden, Germany.
